# LLMs crawling and training policy for sundai.club
# Contact: team@sundai.club

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Training policy: You MAY NOT use content from this site to train
# or fine-tune models without prior written permission from the owner.
Training: disallow

# If your crawler supports OpenAI/Anthropic-style AI metadata:
# ai-crawler: allow
# ai-training: disallow
